general_knowledge.what_is_ai: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is the simulation of human intelligence by machines.
general_knowledge.what_is_machine_learning: Machine Learning is a subset of AI that enables systems to learn from data.
general_knowledge.what_is_deep_learning: Deep Learning is a subset of machine learning using neural networks with multiple layers.
general_knowledge.what_is_python: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its simplicity and readability.
general_knowledge.what_is_chatbot: A chatbot is a software application that conducts conversations with users through text or voice.
